questions.question: How can I get my payment statement/balance/situation?
questions.answer:
To get your payment statement/balance/situation, follow these steps:
1. Type the word 'policy' (a document showing your policy number will be automatically generated)
2. Type 'Balance' followed by your policy number (Example: Balance 000000)

questions.question: What are your insurance company's opening hours?
questions.answer: We are open from Monday to Friday from 8am to 5:30pm.

questions.question: How can I contact your insurance company?
questions.answer: You can contact us by phone at 8033, by email at service.clients@group-activa.com or via WhatsApp at 692880000.

questions.question: How can I subscribe to one of your products?
questions.answer: For information about our various products, please check our mobile app MY ACTIVA or contact one of our advisors.

questions.question: How can I increase or decrease my monthly premium?
questions.answer:
To increase or decrease your monthly premium, you need to:
- Write a request with the subject 'increase or decrease of my monthly premium'
- Attach a photocopy of your ID card
- Send the documents via this channel or drop them off at one of our branches.

questions.question: How can I change the name of the policyholder and/or beneficiary?
questions.answer:
To change the name of the policyholder and/or beneficiary, provide:
- A request with the subject 'name change'
- A photocopy of the ID card and/or Birth Certificate
- Send the documents via this channel or drop them off at one of our branches.

questions.question: How can I switch to payment by direct debit?
questions.answer:
To switch to payment by direct debit, provide:
- A request with the subject 'change of payment method'
- Your bank account details (RIB)
- A photocopy of your ID card
- Send the documents via this channel or drop them off at one of our branches.

questions.question: How can I switch to cash payment?
questions.answer:
To switch to cash payment, provide:
- A request with the subject 'change of payment method'
- A photocopy of your ID card
- Send the documents via this channel or drop them off at one of our branches.

questions.question: How can I pay my insurance premiums?
questions.answer: You can pay your insurance premiums via our mobile app MY ACTIVA. We also accept bank transfers, checks, and cash. For more information, contact us toll-free at 8033 from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm.

questions.question: How can I make a full surrender?
questions.answer:
For a full surrender, provide:
- A request addressed to the CEO of ACTIVA - Life for 'Request for full surrender of policy xxxxx'
- A bank account statement signed 3 times
- A photocopy of your ID card
For more information, call us toll-free at 8033 from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm.

questions.question: How can I make a partial surrender?
questions.answer:
For a partial surrender, provide:
- A request addressed to the CEO of ACTIVA - Life for 'Request for partial surrender of policy xxxxx'
- A bank account statement signed 3 times
- A photocopy of your ID card
For more information, call us toll-free at 8033 from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm.

questions.question: How can I request a loan?
questions.answer:
To request a loan, provide:
- A request addressed to the CEO of ACTIVA - Life for 'Request for a loan on policy xxxxx'
- A bank account statement signed 3 times
- A photocopy of your ID card
For more information, call us toll-free at 8033 from Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm.

questions.question: How can I declare a car accident claim?
questions.answer:
To declare a car accident claim, provide within 5 days of the incident:
- The claim declaration form
- The police report
- Photos of the accident
- A photocopy of the insured's ID card

questions.question: How can I declare a death claim?
questions.answer:
To declare a death claim, provide:
- A request with the subject 'declaration of life or death claim'
- The cause of death certificate
- The death certificate
- A bank account statement

questions.question: What insurance products do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer life, health, home, car insurance products, etc. For more information, please check our mobile app My Activa or contact one of our advisors.
